<title level="1" right="Rules">[Bright Light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 464 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
In bright light, such as sunlight, creatures and objects can be observed clearly by anyone with average vision or better. Some types of creatures are dazzled or blinded by bright light.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
